responses: Hello! How can I assist you today?
Hi there, what IT issue can I help you with?
Greetings! How can I be of service?
Goodbye! Have a great day.
See you next time!
Bye! Feel free to reach out if you need further assistance.
You're welcome!
Happy to help!
Anytime, let me know if there's anything else.

patterns: How can I reset my password?
Can you help with a password issue?
responses: To reset your password, go to the selfcare portal, https://selfcare.gloworld.com and follow the instructions.
You can reset your password via HRMS portal.

patterns: I can't connect to the internet
responses: Please try restarting your router or checking your network cables.
Ensure you are connected to the correct network. If the issue persists, contact IT support.
You might need to reconnect or check if the WiFi password has changed.
Check your spam folder and ensure your email address is correct.
Try logging out and back in to refresh your session.
If the problem persists, contact our IT department for assistance.

patterns: I need help installing a program
responses: Go to the software download page on our intranet and follow the installation wizard.
Make sure you have administrator privileges before installing new software.
If you encounter any errors during installation, contact IT support.

patterns: My computer is not turning on
responses: Try unplugging and replugging your computer into the power source.
Check if other devices work on the same power outlet.
If the issue persists, contact IT support for hardware diagnostics.

patterns: I think my account has been hacked
responses: Please change your password immediately and report this incident to IT security.
We'll investigate the matter and notify you once the issue is resolved.
In the meantime, monitor your account activities closely.
Check that the printer is properly connected and powered on.
Ensure you have sufficient paper and ink/toner supplies.
Try restarting the printer or contacting IT support for further assistance.
Verify that you have the necessary permissions to access those files.
Check if the file path is correct and try accessing it from another location.
If the issue persists, contact IT support for further assistance.
Go to 'Settings' > 'Software Update' to check for available updates.
Ensure your computer is connected to the internet for updates.
If you encounter any issues during update, contact IT support.

patterns: My emails are being filtered incorrectly
responses: Check your email filter settings and adjust them if necessary.
Consider whitelisting important senders to prevent filtering issues.
If the problem persists, contact IT support for assistance.

patterns: How do I access remote desktop?
responses: Download and install the Remote Desktop Client from our intranet.
Ensure you have a stable internet connection for remote access.
Contact IT support if you encounter any connectivity issues.
Go to 'Settings' > 'Backup' to create or manage your backup schedule.
For file restoration, use the built-in recovery options in your software.
If you require advanced assistance, please contact IT support.
Check that the recipient's email address is correct.
Verify that email forwarding is enabled in your account settings.
If the issue persists, contact IT support for further assistance.
Go to 'Settings' > 'Apps' to find and remove unwanted applications.
Ensure you have administrator privileges before uninstalling software.
If you encounter any errors during uninstallation, contact IT support.

patterns: How do I set up Outlook on computer?
Need help with Outlook email configuration on computer
responses: Go to https://mail.gloworld.com/owa and sign in with your official email account.
Ensure the Outlook app is installed on your system, then launch it.
For further help, contact the IS Helpdesk.

patterns: How do I set up Outlook on my phone?
responses: Go to https://mail.gloworld.com/owa and sign in with your official email account.
Download the Outlook app from your device's app store then follow the instructions.
Sign in with your Microsoft account or work email address.

patterns: CPU usage high when playing audio
responses: Close unnecessary background applications to reduce CPU usage.
Update your sound drivers and audio software to the latest version.
Adjust audio settings in your operating system control panel.
Contact HR department to initiate the account creation process.
Provide HR department with required employee details for account setup.
To reset time and date, open Settings > System > Date & time.
Turn off 'Set time automatically', select correct time zone, then turn it back on.
After changing, restart your computer and verify the time is correct.
Close unnecessary apps and background processes.
Run Disk Cleanup and defragment your hard drive.
Consider upgrading RAM or switching to SSD for better performance.
Lower screen brightness and turn off unnecessary features.
Update battery drivers and adjust power settings.
Consider replacing the battery if it's old.
Try unplugging and replugging the keyboard.
Check keyboard drivers and update them if necessary.
If external, try connecting the keyboard to another computer.
Try restarting your computer or unplugging and replugging the mouse.
Check mouse drivers and update them if needed.
If wireless, check batteries and ensure receiver is properly connected.
